alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:20AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 500 AM MST... At 418 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Palma, or 8 miles south of Coolidge, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Magma, San Tan Valley, Coolidge Airport, Bapchule, Olberg, Arizola, San Tan Mountain Park, Randolph, Valley Farms, Sacaton, Santan and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 170 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 163 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
